attributes.action: To let planned school trips go ahead in non affected area’s
attributes.additional_details:
because every single trip has been cancelled even in non infected areas 
If the parliament is not taking action to prevent spread in England by shutting schools 
why stop the ways schools operate? 
I recommended you give a safer route or allow schools to carry on .
It’s all educational and you have kept the schools open for educational purposes? 
So does this not affect children’s learning ?
They are only this age once and your taking that away from them
attributes.background: To allow schools who have put hard work into organizing the trips take place as children are missing out on big opportunity’s.Is the government going to stop all school trips in the future if the virus carries on? children are not fulfilling their childhood to the fullest,by putting restrictions

rejection.details:
Since this petition was started, the Government has announced that all educational institutions will close until further notice. 

You can read the announcement here:
https://hansard.parliament.uk/commons/2020-03-18/debates/FCD4DEB2-86A8-4F95-8EB8-D0EF4C752D7D/EducationalSettings

You can watch the announcement here: 
https://parliamentlive.tv/event/index/b4bb9e13-abb9-43ef-ab22-ef917055fb1a?in=17:16:37

If you want schools to be kept open, you may wish to sign this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301084

We also can't accept petitions that are started with an incomplete name.
